channel.title: Server hacker? Help!
channel.description: I made a server bussy editing it etc. Then a guy named Mod Allstars commes in and Ip-Bans me and takes it over. Now I Ip-Banned ip , But my question is can he comme back?? It's really anoying. And how can he connect to the server and take over? + how can he know i'm using his source if it is the real one. And why does he hacked it?

item.title: Server hacker? Help!
item.dc:creator: @alexsasha2 alexsasha2
item.description:
@alexsasha2 wrote:

ok sorry a person who wants to crash/TAKE OVER your server cannot be ip-banned because they can always find another way into your server… that better si force???

Read full topic

item.title: Server hacker? Help!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Just bequiet…

A server cannot be “Hacked”, Its just a person taking advantage of what the original
Owner of Allstarscape added to the server,

Check client.java and Your data file for his name, And in the data file,
Open up moderators,administrators,staff,

Find and delete his name and in future, Always take this precaution,
This may also be set for ip’s,
So mind that too.

Read full topic

item.description:

ok if you try to ip-ban a hacker it will never work… i have something i will post in a little bit that might help you but i dont know if it will because i used it to stop syi’s… so if it works just tell me so i will post that soon…

Read full topic

item.title: Server hacker? Help!
item.dc:creator: @Creative2008 Creative2008
item.description:
@Creative2008 wrote:

I did that , But when I edit Cleint .java I can’t edit all so the respectfull owners will always have credits because i am a new coder and don’t quit understand everything.
I use rage scape now but i’m looking for a new source I gonna make a website and post credits to the owner up there So I wont have this problem again ( I hope ).
Thank-you all !

Read full topic

item.title: Server hacker? Help!
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

well… he cant hack your server he is a totally noob for that i suppose… in allstar the one that released it has made his name on the ipban command… so someone knows that and logs in with that name and ipbans you all… its so simple go to characters and search for his name and open it and find the ip and go to data and find bannedips and paste his ip there… he wont be able to join agian…

Read full topic

item.title: Server hacker? Help!
item.dc:creator: @alexsasha2 alexsasha2
item.description:
@alexsasha2 wrote:

ok the reason he hacks your server is because he is too lazy to make his own or he wants to destroy other poepls work. and on the question on how he hacks your server is that he uses a cheat client that gives him ip’s so hope this answer some oh and he could come back but you never know he might not but just incase have a couple of accounts(yours of course) and make them all owners just in case he comes back and if he ip-ban’s you then get on with a different account(one of the other owners) and ip ban him then switch you ip and source. The same thing happened to me not too long ago and this helped me so try it and tell me if it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Server hacker? Help!
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

If the person coded the command “IP BAN” and forgot to only make it for rights at 3, then he could do it.
Its probably the coders fault, or the ‘hacker’ must of crashed the server and he thought that the server kicked everyone.

Read full topic

item.title: Server hacker? Help!
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

As mentioned above, yes.

Read full topic

item.title: Server hacker? Help!
item.dc:creator: @sabotage sabotage
item.description:
@sabotage wrote:

[quote=“Retard Monkey, post:4, topic:232642”]Chances are it is not the real Mod Allstar, because he’s a nice guy, especially if you give him credit.
Yes, he can come back, but if you use a source again create an account with the original owner’s name to stop people from taking over (or simply change it all in client.java).

For example, if I was using ReapageScape source, some random guy might claim they were Reaper and come online and take over the server. However, if I had already made an account with that name, they would have the invalid password.
Problem solved.

If I wasn’t too clear, sorry.
I’ll try and explain more soon.[/quote]If in client.java, Ip ban rights are by name, yeah, someone could come on and claim the name and have control over it. Search for “Mod allstar” in client.java and change it to what your name is.

Read full topic

item.title: Server hacker? Help!
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

I made a server, and I was busy editing it, Then a guy named 'Mod Allstar' logs in and Ip-Bans me and takes the server over, the bastard! Now I have IP-banned him, but my question is is there any way he can come back? It's really annoying. And how can he connect to the server and take it all over? Furthermore, how can he know that I was using his source? And why did the bastard hack it?

Fixed a little bit (I added bastard a few times)?

Oh and to tony:
That may be true but some commands and features are only accessible to one user, in this case possibly Mod Allstar (such as getpass, for example).

Read full topic

item.title: Server hacker? Help!
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:5, topic:232642”][quote author=Retard Monkey link=topic=306816.msg2453765#msg2453765 date=1222114660]
Chances are it is not the real Mod Allstar, because he’s a nice guy, especially if you give him credit.
Yes, he can come back, but if you use a source again create an account with the original owner’s name to stop people from taking over (or simply change it all in client.java).

For example, if I was using ReapageScape source, some random guy might claim they were Reaper and come online and take over the server. However, if I had already made an account with that name, they would have the invalid password.
Problem solved.

If I wasn’t too clear, sorry.
I’ll try and explain more soon.
[/quote]

Except for one thing.
When you download a source, he should make sure all char files are deleted. That way, the Guy wonr have ownership, will just be a regular player with absolutely 0 chance of messing up anything.[/quote]No, certain commands check if the username is mod allstar, and if it is, then he can use the command.

Read full topic

item.title: Server hacker? Help!
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“Retard Monkey, post:4, topic:232642”]Chances are it is not the real Mod Allstar, because he’s a nice guy, especially if you give him credit.
Yes, he can come back, but if you use a source again create an account with the original owner’s name to stop people from taking over (or simply change it all in client.java).

For example, if I was using ReapageScape source, some random guy might claim they were Reaper and come online and take over the server. However, if I had already made an account with that name, they would have the invalid password.
Problem solved.

If I wasn’t too clear, sorry.
I’ll try and explain more soon.[/quote]

Except for one thing.
When you download a source, he should make sure all char files are deleted. That way, the Guy wonr have ownership, will just be a regular player with absolutely 0 chance of messing up anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Server hacker? Help!
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Chances are it is not the real Mod Allstar, because he’s a nice guy, especially if you give him credit.
Yes, he can come back, but if you use a source again create an account with the original owner’s name to stop people from taking over (or simply change it all in client.java).

For example, if I was using ReapageScape source, some random guy might claim they were Reaper and come online and take over the server. However, if I had already made an account with that name, they would have the invalid password.
Problem solved.

If I wasn’t too clear, sorry.
I’ll try and explain more soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Server hacker? Help!
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Well if he didn’t IP ban himself, or no one ever banned him - then he isn’t banned.

Don’t get your other question, and he most likely uses a cheat client to hack your server.
Why did he hack it? -> Ask him
